nodes.bodyText: put some comments here... and actually I don't see a reason why this code wouldn't be kept the same for the older version too?
definitely put comments here ... I don't like a Thread.sleep really
Why does it need the sleep anyway?
Why this change. Were these packages unexported in the 3.1.7.SP1 bundle manifest?

-Bundle-Description: Weld OSGi Bundle, version 3.1.4.Final
